name: PresentOnAdmissionIsYesOrExempt
title: Present On Admission is Yes or Exempt
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to identify that diagnosis is present on admission or exempt from POA status.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to encounter diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that identify a diagnosis indicator of being present on admission or exempt from POA status.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent a diagnosis indicator of not being present on admission or unable to determine.)

concept.display: Unreported/Not used. Exempt from POA reporting
Diagnosis was present at time of inpatient admission

contains.display: Unreported/Not used. Exempt from POA reporting
Diagnosis was present at time of inpatient admission
